original_text: Our ancestors did not serve the Lord faithfully. They did things that the Lord our God saw were evil. They turned away from him. They stopped worshipping him in his temple, where he lives. They completely turned against him.
korean_text: 우리 조상들이 범죄하여 우리 하나님 여호와 보시기에 악을 행하여 하나님을 버리고 얼굴을 돌려 여호와의 성소를 등지고

sentences.original_text: Our ancestors did not serve the Lord faithfully.
sentences.korean_translation: 우리 조상들은 주님을 충성스럽게 섬기지 않았습니다.

sentences.original_text: They did things that the Lord our God saw were evil.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 주 우리 하나님이 악하다고 보신 일들을 했습니다.

sentences.original_text: They stopped worshipping him in his temple,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그의 성전에서 그를 경배하는 것을 그만두었고,
